verses.roman:
samudra-snāna kari' prabhu āilā nija sthāne
advaitādi gelā sindhu karibāre snāne

synonyms: samudra-snāna kari'-after bathing in the sea; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āilā—came; nija sthāne—to His own place; advaita-ādi—devotees, headed by Advaita Prabhu; gelā—went; sindhu—to the ocean; karibāre—just to take; snāne—bath.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu returned to His residence after taking a bath in the sea, all the devotees, headed by Advaita Prabhu, went to bathe in the sea.
